dialogue.introduction: Fourth ship of the Hatsuharu-class, Hatsushimo. Let's go and give it our all!
dialogue.library_intro: Fourth of the Hatsuharu-class destroyers, Hatsushimo. I was in lots of hard battles like the Operation AL, the Battle of the Komandorski Islands, the occupation of Kiska, the Battle of the Philippine Sea, Operation Hoku-Go and Ten-Ichi-Gō! I really did my best!
dialogue.secretary1: That's right, I want to save as many as I can...you're the same, aren't you, Admiral?
dialogue.secretary3: A-Admiral? Ahh, you’re adjusting my RADAR, aren’t you? How silly of me; thank you as always.
dialogue.secretaryidle: Hamakaze...Yahagi too, I wonder if they're okay...ah! Admiral! I'm just fine. I would save you too!
dialogue.secretarymarried: Eh? I feel...a little sad. ...N-No, it's okay. You understand me, Admiral. That's more than enough for me... Thank you, Admiral...
dialogue.wedding: Kiska... Ah, I'm sorry! I'm not interested in romance right now... even so, will you wait for me...?
dialogue.show_players_score: Yes, our combat strategy is important. Say "no" to reckless plans! Right?
dialogue.supply: Thank you for resupplying me. Should I set down the flammable materials?
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I'll take a break, just for a bit.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: With this, I'll be able to protect everyone again.
dialogue.docking_complete: A comrade has finished being repaired.
dialogue.ship_construction: Looks like a new comrade has been born.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: It seems the fleet's returned to base. Good work!
dialogue.start_a_sortie: A sortie, then? I'll brace myself and do my best!
dialogue.night_battle: It's time to demonstrate the Torpedo Squadron's true power!
dialogue.mvp: Even if it's just one boat, just one man, if I can save them, then I'm satisfied.
dialogue.new_year_2015: It's a new year. Happy New Year! Hatsushimo will do her best this year! Yes!
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Today is a important day, isn't it? I want to celebrate in something like diamond formation. Eh? I shouldn't?
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Demons out! Luck in! Ei! Ahh, Teitoku?! I'm sorry; I'll clean this up.
